attributes.action: Ban letting agents from refusing DSS payments from the homeless.
attributes.additional_details:
Homeless Stats

Sex (Crisis, 2014)

84% of homeless are male 

Sexual Orientation (ATK, 2014)

24% of homeless from the LGBT community.

Disability (Homeless Link, 2014)

73% of homeless have physical health issue (41% are long term)
80% of homeless have mental health issue (45% officially diagnosed)

Ethnicity (The Guardian, 2013)

37% of homeless households are from black and ethnic minorities.
attributes.background:
There is currently an epidemic of homelessness in the UK. Letting agents and buy-to-let landlords persistently refuse housing to individuals who would pay rent via DSS. 

Such actions indirectly discriminate against the protected characteristics of homeless persons, outlined in The Equality Act.
